title: Video-Based MPAA Rating Prediction: An Attention-Driven Hybrid Architecture Using Contrastive Learning
summary: This paper proposes an attention-driven hybrid architecture using contrastive learning for video-based MPAA rating prediction, addressing challenges in automated video classification and employing contextual contrastive learning.
usefulness_reason: Score 60 assigned because the title 'Video-Based' implies spatio-temporal data, and the summary mentions 'Contextual Contrastive Learning', which is relevant to 'Contextual dataset'.
